story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0101_0100_1:
Ugh! Come on! We're s’pposed to be resting up
so we can be perfect-o before the semifinaaals!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0101_0200_1: We have no choice! Let’s stand our ground, Rachel!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0101_0700_1:
Oh? You wanna stand in our way? Then we’ll just
have to beat you first!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0501_0300_1:
What’s wrong, Rachel? Aren’t you going to
thank them?
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0501_0400_1: Well, I mean, they DID save us, but...
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0501_0500_1:
We can’t get all soft and thankful just yet! What if
that makes it harder to battle them?
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0501_0600_1: Grahahahaw! THAT’S what you’re worried about?
story_zako_battle_28_06/3701_0501_0700_1:
Don’t worry. Those are two separate things.
I certainly won’t go easy on them in the semifinals,
either! So come on...
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0101_0100_1:
Aha! We meet yet again! Remember us?
Team Break baddies, comin’ atcha!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0101_0200_1:
I was bad back in school, and I’m still bad now!
Who cares about math when bein’ bad feels
so good!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0101_0300_1:
Can you count how many girls are on
this team? That’s right—one!
The same as my average test score!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0101_0400_1:
I am muscle! I am brawn! I am war!
I oversleep and run late—brutally late!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0101_0500_1:
I am the Chief Intelligence Officer of the
Team Break baddies! My bovine brethren
will render you defenseless!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0101_0600_1:
We once disbanded but have now made our heroic
comeback after hearing how great Team Break
is doing!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_0100_1:
Defeated for a third time... I guess we have no
choice but to disband again.
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_0400_1:
I can’t stand the thought of us all getting
separated again!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_0500_1:
Me neither! If our previous disbandment taught
us anything...
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_0800_1:
We don’t have to disband just ’cause we lost!
Right, Leader?!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_0900_1:
Ahhh! You’re right! You’re all right! The Team
Break baddies are eternal! Together forever!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_1000_1:
All right, you guys! It’s time to make our
heroic retreat!
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_1100_1:
Huh. I guess Team Break members have their own
kind of friendship...
story_zako_battle_28_06/3801_0501_1300_1:
It’s a shame that they don’t put that strong sense
of friendship to use somewhere other than
Team Break...
